effect.sword_shield: Inflicts regular damage. This move’s type matches the user’s first type, if any; otherwise, it’s typeless.
effect.the_isle_of_armor: Inflicts regular damage. This move’s type matches the user’s first type, if any; otherwise, it’s typeless.

effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. This move’s type matches the user’s first type, if any; otherwise, it’s typeless.
effect.legends_arceus: Inflicts regular damage. This move’s type matches the user’s first type, if any; otherwise, it’s typeless.

short_effect.sword_shield: Has the same type as the user.
short_effect.the_isle_of_armor: Has the same type as the user.
short_effect.the_crown_tundra: Has the same type as the user.
short_effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Has the same type as the user.
short_effect.legends_arceus: Has the same type as the user.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user attacks the target by dancing very hard. The user’s type determines the type of this move.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user attacks the target by dancing very hard. The user's type determines the type of this move.
